revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Slumbering Weald Shrine |image = [[File:Slumbering Weald Shrine.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Slumbering Weald Shrine. |tokens = 2,000,000 |location = West of Postwick, in Slumbering Weald }} '''Slumbering Weald Shrine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 27,009,504 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
